column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We were in Chicago celebrating our anniversary for a long weekend and my husband wanted us to have a nice dinner at a steakhouse. Even though i do not eat red meat
column2: i was sure i would find something to eat. We made a reservation (recommended)and took an Uber from the hotel. When we arrived
column3: we were warmly greeted and shown to our table
column5: almost like in a cellar. Pretty neat space
column6: very upscale in decor and the ambiance is nice. All through the restaurant is dimmed lights
column8: which adds to the romantic atmosphere.
